Allen.Oak Point Park and Nature Preserve: Oak Point Park and Nature Preserve is an 800-acre park in Plano, TX and is the largest park in the city. The park is bordered by Chapparal Road to the North, Los Rios Boulevard to the East, Parker Road to the South, and Spring Creek Parkway to the West. Oak Point Park and Preserve has 3.5 miles of concrete trails and 5 miles of soft trails, many of which are located along Rowlett Creek.
